name: Gunita
description:
A story-driven, adventure game combining exploration with beautiful landscapes.
Find a way to the mountain and fulfill your friends wish.  Solve puzzles and traverse in the city of Perlas, where the story is buried.

The Story
Your closest friend died, you are a robot who find a way to scatter your friends ash on a mountain peak.

Key Features

Solve Puzzles: The city of Perlas has many secrets to tell, find them all and unveil the story behind the disaster.
Traverse the city: The city of Perlas isn't just a city it is the most well build place, find all the hints and collect some items.
Bow-Oriented Combat: Some of the robots still lurking in the city defend yourself or just hide.
